members.name: provideMockStore

docs.returns: Mock store providers that can be used with both `TestBed.configureTestingModule` and `Injector.create`.

params.name: config
params.description: `MockStoreConfig<T>` to provide the values for `INITIAL_STATE` and `MOCK_SELECTORS` tokens. By default, `initialState` and `selectors` are not defined.
